[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/temp.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/temp/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install temp```#### Examples```python>>> import temp>>> temp.tempdir() # dir'/var/folders/rv/gy6_gnfs1d7_pd1518p27tsr0000gn/T/tmpqlLDxb'>>> temp.tempfile() # file'/var/folders/rv/gy6_gnfs1d7_pd1518p27tsr0000gn/T/tmpsctFHJ'>>> temp.TMPDIR'/var/folders/rv/gy6_gnfs1d7_pd1518p27tsr0000gn/T'```
